name: Ce Game 1.png
description:
This was my first real attempt at making a game using construct3.  I'm so glad to have had this experience of making this game, learning how to make a game, realizing software really shoudn't be free because it takes so long to make, I mean the E T Atari game was made in 9 months and look how that turned out. I learned so much by making this game because it taught me that making real games is no easy task. I'm glad to have had this experience. There was a lot I couldn't do in this game because of time constraints. I couldn't add extra levels or bosses or get the enemies working fully functionally, but I think it turned out alright.

Sources: 

Hero

Skeleton/Enemy

Forest Background

Tilemap/Tileset/Platforms

Sounds: 

Hurt/Pain/Damage sound (yes this is where Mojang got it from)

Death sound

Background music (I created this myself. everything else is free/widely available)

Gotta love the anti-aliasing on this
